function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Shifting transportation and land-use patterns leading to changes in urban infrastructure and public spaces","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased teleworking leading to potential homebuyers considering a new home if telework arrangements continue post-pandemic","category":"Visitors","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Expectation of higher sale price leading to delay in selling homes","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased demand for new construction homes leading to more densely populated areas","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relocation from dense cities to suburbs","category":"Visitors","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing and sanitation in shared pet-friendly spaces may contribute to the transmission of diseases among pet owners and their animals.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased emphasis on outdoor space may lead to overcrowding in outdoor public spaces, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for home amenities like pools, waterfronts, and docks may lead to overcrowding and increased contact, contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Growing interest in gourmet kitchens may result in greater use of communal cooking and dining spaces, leading to potential contamination and the spread of foodborne illnesses.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lockdowns and social distancing impacting construction companies","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in demand for homes with dedicated office spaces due to remote work","category":"Visitors","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Legal implications and contract revisions due to covid-19","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monetization of housing leading to overcrowding and substandard living conditions","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited or zero access to common areas and non-essential amenities in residential buildings","category":"Visitors","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift in homebuyer preferences and housing locations due to covid-19 could lead to spread of contagious diseases in new residential areas.","category":"Visitors","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased density in urban areas due to the need for affordable housing. this could lead to higher risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conversion of office spaces in city centers to residential units could lead to changes in population density and potential disease exposure.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortages of affordable housing for low-income people and families","category":"Visitors","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in road traffic flows and major cities experiencing drops in rush-hour traffic congestion","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of infection in cities due to close contact in vulnerable households, construction sites, and local businesses.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerable groups such as the elderly, women, the poor, and migrants disproportionately affected by pandemic","category":"Visitors","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards digital life and remote work","category":"Visitors","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Customized policy responses to covid-19 are important based on the local situation and the needs of local people.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Temporary suspension of evictions in multiple countries","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mortgage and rent payment suspensions in multiple countries","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Support measures for construction industry and utility bill payment","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor urban design and architecture contributing to disease propagation","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of crises on sustainable development","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption to energy demand and supply due to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate preparation for future waves of covid-19 outbreaks","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sustainability rating methods may not adequately prioritize social and health aspects","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate response to pandemic resilience requirements by existing green building certification systems","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overlap of residential and office real estate sectors","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in sustainability requirements for residential buildings","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The real estate industry was severely affected by the covid-19 pandemic in both the residential and commercial sectors.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy issues to maintain social distancing measures","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to affordable and adequate housing","category":"Visitors","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability of households to pay bills due to the pandemic","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Amplified housing insecurity due to the crisis","category":"Visitors","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High transmission of respiratory viruses among younger children","category":"Visitors","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or no reporting of key data randomisation, blinding, numerators and denominators, interventions, outcomes, attrition of participants, confidence intervals, cluster coefficients .","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential biases such as cash incentives given to participants.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High incidence rates of respiratory viruses during major epidemics worldwide","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Serious pandemic viral infections such as sars and avian influenza","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns and surveillance societies related to big data analytics","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for understanding human behavior at individual and collective levels","category":"Visitors","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear and targeted messaging in different regions","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of division of agreed goals between research institutions and public authorities may lead to conflicting priorities and objectives in the development of public monitoring programmes","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close collaboration with local authorities and citizen partners may increase the risk of disease transmission if proper health and safety measures are not followed.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Publication of real-time urban movement data and covid-19 dashboard may lead to public panic or misinformation if not presented and interpreted accurately.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"}]}
